titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of Agriculture to convey certain lands in Austin, Nevada, to the Austin Historical Mining District Historical Society, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

action.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.

committee.name: Senate Energy and Natural Resources
committee.subcommittee: Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

bill.summary: 8/6/1993--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to convey certain lands in Austin, Nevada, to the Austin Historic Mining District Historical Society for use as a museum or other public purpose.
